title: How to Use the DUNE Catalog

sections.title: Basic Search
sections.content: Enter your search terms in the search box and select a category. Toggle "Official" to search only official datasets.

sections.title: Categories
sections.content: Each tab has specific categories. Select the appropriate category for your search to narrow down results.

sections.title: Saved Searches
sections.content: Use the "Saved Searches" dropdown to quickly access commonly used search configurations. Selecting a saved search will automatically switch to the appropriate tab and populate the search fields.

sections.title: Authentication
sections.content: You must be signed in to perform searches. Click the login button in the top right to sign in.

sections.title: Tabs
sections.content: Different tabs organize searches by detector type. You can switch between tabs to access different categories and saved searches.

sections.title: Sorting Results
sections.content: To sort the results of a query, click the column name to sort the column by ascending order, clicking it again will switch to descending.
